name: Boris and the Miserable Factory of Mr. Bossman
name_original: Boris and the Miserable Factory of Mr. Bossman
description:
TOMATO SOUP INC RECRUITS! Responsible for Sorting Soups (F/M/NB) Company Description : Tomato Soup Inc, is a FAMILIAL and DYNAMIC company looking for NEW TALENTS to sort our delicious soups. Created in 2021, our 6 months of experience allow us to benefit from know-how worthy of the oldest traditions. Join a YOUNG and PERFORMING team by sending us an E-MAIL. Job Description : You will have to sort the good soups from the bad soups and exercise JUDGMENT and SPEED (not like our last soup sorting manager: Boris Soupinich, whom we are late to fire.) Be careful to sort the different soups carefully to prevent our new machine(replacing the one Boris broke), from exploding. Qualifications :

-You benefit from two thumbs and a bit of savvy (not like Boris) -You are passionate about soup of all kinds and dream of making this passion your professional career -Your first name Does not start with "Bo" and does not end with "ris" -You have at least 10 years of experience in the canned soup industry Advantages of the position to be promoted:  -Free access to tomato soups for the entire duration of your contract (limited to one per week) - Unlimited access to the microwave in the cafeteria to heat up your meals for lunch! (especially soups) -A salary of up to 10 $ above the minimum wage for a minimum of 45 hours of work per week.

Attached Below are the documents corresponding to the company's expectations with regard to the position to be promoted.
